ygData.subject: Re: The Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wasn t finished and hit the send button.  Oops :) Anyway, I think we should change  #4 to this 4) O Kiels Radiation seems that it would be the beginning
ygData.messageBody:
mstokes wrote:

> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> I would like to thank everyone for their comments and inputs to the
> petition. We seem to have reached a majority of people agreeing on it.
> I realize that many people would like to have things added to it, but my
> fear is that the longer it gets, the less we will agree on it. Also, I
> intentionally left out specific examples for the sake of brevity

I wasn't finished and hit the send button. Oops :)

Anyway,

I think we should change #4 to this

4) O'Kiels Radiation seems that it would be the beginning of a great line
of spells. Why should it end there? Cold and Magic based buff / damage
shields would be a very welcome addition.

Druids are kings of damage shields, and enchanters are the king of buffs.
We get both, although weaker, in one spell

and #5 to this

5) Wizards seem to be very neglected when it comes to carrying or wearing
items that enhance our appearance. In addition, many completely different
spells have the same visual effects.

(In addition sounds better than "also")

My feeling is that we should all sign one petition. Mass E-Mails just
anger people.
What I would like is a volenteer to collect the screen names, and character
names of the signers to append to the list.

ex

Halfpintzz aka Malkin of Fennin Ro, Wizard 3rd Rank

Verant wants screen names not charater names

Thanks again.
